information: The maximum number of points is 100.

criteria.title:
Dear reviewers!
Only the requirements specified in the criteria are checked.
If a certain moment in the criteria is not described, it is not checked and not evaluated.
All doubts are in favor of the student. If you are not sure whether to deduct points or not, do not deduct them.

criteria.text: Test Runner Setup (Jest/Vitest configured with RTL, coverage reporting works)
Search Component Tests (localStorage, user input, search functionality)
Results/CardList Component Tests (rendering, data display, loading states)
Error Boundary Tests (error handling, fallback UI)
API Integration Tests (mocked API calls, success/error handling)
Husky Pre-push Hook (tests run automatically before push)
Presence of code smells (God-object, chunks of duplicate code), commented code sections
Direct DOM manipulations inside the React components
Usage of Redux or other state management libraries
Usage of component libraries, e.g. Material UI, Ant Design
Pull Request doesn't follow guideline (including checkboxes in Score) PR example
